BBVADLPA.MX.long_name: Fondo BBVA Bancomer Deuda Largo Plazo SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
BBVADLPA.MX.summary: The aim of BMERLP is offering investors the option to invest in securities issued or guaranteed by the Federal Government, the Bank of Mexico, as well as state and local governments, lending institutions, corporate, domestic and foreign, live or repo in pesos, UDI and / or U.S. dollars cash and bank deposits at sight in financial institutions, in weights and / or dollars. The Fund also may invest in derivatives on recognized markets, structured securities and / or backed by assets in accordance with the regulations issued by the CNBV and Banco de Mexico, denominated in local currency and / or foreign. The Fund will have a long-term investment strategy, seeking to capitalize on market movements.
BBVADLPA.MX.family: BBVA Bancomer GestiÃ³n SA de CV

BLKCP1A.MX.short_name: BLK Calce II SA de CV F.I.I.D.
BLKCP1A.MX.long_name: BLK Calce II SA de CV F.I.I.D. A
BLKCP1A.MX.summary:
The family consists BNMCP investment companies that seek to capitalize on market movements debt without minimum or maximum limits by instrument. These investment companies have the flexibility and dynamism to acquire investment assets based objects to optimize their profitability under adequate risk control.
The aim of the Investment Company is to be a vehicle in which both resources are invested pension funds, institutional clients or any other legal person (see section "Possible acquirers), which requires long-term investments. The family consists of two funds BNMCP differing investment portfolios considering the length of each of them.
BLKCP1A.MX.family: Impulsora de Fondos Banamex SA de CV

BLKPZOA.MX.long_name: BLK Deuda MÃ©xico - Mediano Plazo SA de CV F.I.I.D. A
BLKPZOA.MX.summary: HZPLAZO is an investment company that invests primarily in debt instruments denominated long-term Mexican peso, which seek to provide competitive performance with respect to its benchmark. The duration of HZPLAZO be long term, ie, more than three years. HZPLAZO invest in debt instruments denominated in Mexican pesos or investment units (IDUs) or foreign currency. Such instruments may be at any time, respecting the duration of the investment assets and may be issued by Mexican or foreign entities, including without limitation those issued by the Federal, State or Municipal in the United States of Mexico, centralized or parastatal entities Federal Public Administration, banks, private companies, as well as deposits. HZPLAZO participation in government securities is preponderant.
BLKPZOA.MX.family: Impulsora de Fondos Banamex SA de CV

INVEXLPA.MX.long_name: Zref 2 SA de CV F.I.I.D. A
INVEXLPA.MX.summary: Providing the individual investor, moral and not moral subject to withholding, the option to invest their resources in investment assets of government debt, banking, private and repurchase of securities issued or guaranteed by the federal government and those issued by the Bank of Mexico, as well as those issued by state or local governments, foreign or domestic, seeking to combine optimum performance characteristics, risk and market liquidity through asset diversification and professional management of your portfolio

NTELPA.MX.long_name: Fondo Banorte Ixe 13, S.A. de C.V., FI.I.D. A
NTELPA.MX.summary: The main objective of IXELP will be the offer mainly a portfolio with a mix of governmental, banking and long-term private debt securities and to a lesser extent, short and medium term. IXELP will seek to provide prior to total expenditure and imposed a performance similar to the rate that pays the Government bond curve, taking as a benchmark PIPG-bonds
NTELPA.MX.family: Fondos Banorte IXE SA de CV

SVIVE60A.MX.summary: The aim of the "Santander pension funds" is put at the disposal of investors an investment alternative to the funds for the retirement savings. VALUEF2A.MX.short_name: VALUE OPERADORA DE SOC DE INV F
VALUEF2A.MX.long_name: Fondo Value Patrimonial SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
VALUEF2A.MX.summary: Facilitate the participation of small and medium investors in the debt securities market looking to capitalize on market movements to obtain competitive yields, whose strategy is to invest in securities of Government, State, municipal, bank debt and private mainly denominated in national currency. The Fund will invest in financial derivative instruments.
